bibl.title: Money and People in the Late Antique Hermopolite. BM 1075 and Related Texts.
bibl.note: Graeco-Coptic account book. Hermopolite nome, 6th century A.D. As a preliminary step to publishing the transcription of the whole codex, presents some of the new facts about the prosopography and finance of the sixth century Hermopolite.
bibl.seg: MacCoull Leslie S.B., Money and People in the Late Antique Hermopolite. BM 1075 and Related Texts.

Graeco-Coptic account book. Hermopolite nome, 6th century A.D. As a preliminary step to publishing the transcription of the whole codex, presents some of the new facts about the prosopography and finance of the sixth century Hermopolite.
